title: Unranked smurf adc lf support
body: As title says lf a support

replies.body:
I think you are asking: what ADCs are able to be played in the support role.
Senna {{champion:235}} was designed for this, but here are some others
{{champion:22}} Ashe, {{champion:21}}  MF, {{champion:51}}  Caitlyn

If what you meant was: what supports can ADC?
Right now, Also Senna {{champion:235}} 
{{champion:412}} Thresh, {{champion:117}}  Lulu


These are who I usually see, don't know about for smurfing though.  Take Care & God Bless.
